title: DIARY-India corporate earnings week ahead
text:
DIARY-India corporate earnings week ahead

Stock Markets 29 minutes ago (Oct 11, 2019 12:01)

© Reuters. DIARY-India corporate earnings week ahead Oct 11 (Reuters) - Diary of India (.BSESN) corporate earnings for the week ahead. INDIA EARNINGS Start Date Start Company Event Name Time(GMT) 14-Oct-2019 NTS HLL.NS Hindustan Unilever (NS: ) Ltd Q2 2020 Hindustan Unilever (LON: ) Ltd Earnings Release 18-Oct-2019 NTS RELI.NS Reliance Industries Ltd (NS: ) Q2 2020 Reliance Industries Ltd Earnings Release ** All times are listed in AMC - 'After market close', or BMO - 'Before market opens', or DBH - 'During business hours', or NTS - 'No time scheduled'. ** This Diary does not provide the EPS estimate figures. EPS figures can be retrieved from Eikon. Steps in Eikon to retrieve the EPS estimate:- Eikon Indicator-> Equities Guide-> Top Indices-> SENSEX-> Events-> Select Event types-> Select the company-> Estimates
